game.name: 港警成雙：來自城寨 Dual Fire Walled City
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Subtitle Options, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dual Fire Walled City is a story-driven co-op game for two players. Featuring close friends who grew up together in the Kowloon Walled City, only to be pulled onto vastly different life paths by a twist of fate. Get ready to immerse yourself in a classic Hong Kong-style movie.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dual Fire Walled City is a story-driven co-op game for two players. Featuring close friends who grew up together in the Kowloon Walled City, only to be pulled onto vastly different life paths by a twist of fate. Get ready to immerse yourself in a classic Hong Kong-style movie.
